00036 #include "ShapeImprover.hpp"
00037 #include "MsqTimer.hpp"

00052 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00053 
00054 const double DEFAULT_BETA = 0.0;
00055 const int DEFUALT_PARALLEL_ITERATIONS = 10;
00056 
00057 ShapeImprover::ShapeImprover() 
00058  : maxTime(300.0), 
00059    mBeta(DEFAULT_BETA),
00060    parallelIterations(DEFUALT_PARALLEL_ITERATIONS)
00061 {}
00062 
00063 void ShapeImprover::set_vertex_movement_limit_factor( double beta )
00064 {
00065   assert(beta > 0.0);
00066   assert(beta < 1.0);
00067   mBeta = beta;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void ShapeImprover::set_cpu_time_limit( double limit )
00071 {
00072   assert(limit >= 0.0);
00073   maxTime = limit;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void ShapeImprover::set_parallel_iterations( int count )
00077 {
00078   if (count < 1) {
00079     assert(false);
00080     count = 1;
00081   }
00082   parallelIterations = count;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ShapeImprover::run_wrapper( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00086                                  ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00087                                  Settings* settings,
00088                                  QualityAssessor* qa,
00089                                  MsqError& err )
00090 {
00091     // Quality Metrics
00092   IdealShapeTarget target;
00093   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00094   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00095 
00096   // only calc min edge length if user hasn't set the vertex_movement_limit_factor
00097   if (!mBeta)
00098   {  
00099     // Calculate minimum edge length in mesh
00100 
00101       // create a temp global patch to get min edge len from
00102     PatchData patch;
00103     patch.set_mesh(mesh);
00104     patch.set_domain(domain);
00105     if (settings)
00106       patch.attach_settings(settings);
00107     std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elems;
00108     std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_verts;
00109     mesh->get_all_elements(patch_elems, err);
00110     mesh->get_all_vertices(patch_verts, err);
00111     patch.set_mesh_entities(patch_elems, patch_verts, err);
00112 
00113       // get min edge length from temp global patch
00114     double min_edge_len = 0.0, max_edge_len = 0.0;
00115     patch.get_minmax_edge_length(min_edge_len, max_edge_len);
00116     mBeta = min_edge_len / 10.0;
00117   }
00118 
00119   TerminationCriterion inner_b;
00120 
00121   // check for inverted elements 
00122 
00123     // create QualityAssessor instance without a Quality Metric
00124   QualityAssessor check_inverted(false, false);
00125   InstructionQueue q_invert_check;
00126     // a QuallityAssessor without a metric will just check for inverted elements and samples
00127   q_invert_check.add_quality_assessor(&check_inverted, err);
00128   q_invert_check.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00129   int inverted_elems = 0, inverted_samples = 0;
00130   check_inverted.get_inverted_element_count(inverted_elems, inverted_samples, err);
00131   if (inverted_elems || inverted_samples)
00132   {
00133     // use non barrier shape improvement on tangled mesh
00134     TShapeNB1 mu_no;
00135     TQualityMetric metric_no_0( &target, &mu_no );
00136     ElementPMeanP metric_no( 1.0, &metric_no_0 );
00137     
00138     // QualityAssessor
00139     qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric_no );
00140    
00141     PMeanPTemplate obj_func_no( 1.0, &metric_no );
00142     ConjugateGradient improver_no( &obj_func_no );
00143     improver_no.use_global_patch();
00144     TerminationCriterion inner_no;
00145     if (maxTime > 0.0)
00146       inner_no.add_cpu_time( maxTime ); 
00147     inner_no.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( mBeta );
00148     improver_no.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner_no );
00149     InstructionQueue q_no;
00150     q_no.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00151     q_no.set_master_quality_improver( &improver_no, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00152     q_no.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00153     q_no.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00154   }
00155   else
00156   {
00157     // use barrer metric on non-tangled mesh
00158 
00159     Timer totalTimer;
00160     TShapeB1 mu_b;
00161     TQualityMetric metric_b_0( &target, &mu_b );
00162     ElementPMeanP metric_b( 1.0, &metric_b_0 );
00163     qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric_b );
00164     PMeanPTemplate obj_func_b( 1.0, &metric_b );
00165     ConjugateGradient improver_b( &obj_func_b );
00166     improver_b.use_global_patch();
00167 
00168     if (maxTime > 0.0)
00169       inner_b.add_cpu_time( maxTime ); 
00170     inner_b.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( mBeta );
00171 
00172     improver_b.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner_b );
00173     InstructionQueue q_b;
00174     q_b.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00175     q_b.set_master_quality_improver( &improver_b, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00176     q_b.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00177     q_b.run_common( mesh_and_domain, pmesh, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00178   }
00179 }
00180 
00181 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
